sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Navbar2 from '../Navbar2/navbar2'; import Footer2 from '../Footer2/Footer2'; import styles from './Privacyv.module.css'; // Import the module.css file function PrivacyPolicy() { return ( <>

Terms and Conditions

Welcome to WedsIn! We want to ensure that you fully understand your rights and responsibilities when using our application. Please take a moment to read and familiarize yourself with our Terms and Conditions, as they are a legally binding agreement between you and Wedsin.com (parent company "Wedsin Limited").
WedsIn Rules
1. Before using our App, you will need to register with us and create an account
("Account"). To create a verified account, you must meet the following criteria:
● You must be at least 21 years old.
● You must be legally permitted to use the App by the laws of your home country.
For more information about how we collect and use your data, please review our Privacy Policy.
If you ever decide to leave WedsIn, you can delete your Account at any time by going to your Profile tab, clicking on "Settings", and selecting the "Delete" option. Your Account will be deleted immediately, and all of your account information will be removed from the App. If you wish to login to your account again, you will need to create a new account.
We may, at our sole discretion, suspend any Account or take other measures to enforce these Terms without prior notice to the user.
Certain features of the App may require a premium upgrade.
We advise against sharing your contact number or bank account details unless you are comfortable doing so.
Types of Content:
The App has three types of content available:
● Your Content: the content you upload and provide.
● Member Content: the content other members provide.
● WedsIn’s Content: the content provided by WedsIn.
Content Restrictions:
We want our users to express themselves freely, but we have to enforce some restrictions on certain content. The following content is not allowed:
● Offensive or harassing language or imagery.
● Obscene, pornographic, or violent content.
● Abusive, discriminatory, or threatening content.
● Defamatory or libelous content.
● Content related to industrial activities, sales, competitions, advertising, links to different websites, or premium line phone numbers.
● Junk mail or spam.
● Spyware, adware, viruses, corrupt files, worm programs, or other malicious code.
● Infringing on any third party's rights, including intellectual property and privacy rights.
● Displaying another person without their consent.
Your Content:
As Your Content is unique, you are responsible for it, and you will defend and indemnify us from any claims associated with it. To ensure your safety, do not display any banking information on your profile page, including that of others. By uploading Your Content on WedsIn, you grant us a non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, nationwide license to use it.
We have the right to remove, edit, limit, or block access to any of Your Content at any time.
Member Content:
Other members will share content on the App. Member Content belongs to the user(s) who posted it, and you have no rights to it. You may only use other WedsIn users' personal information to the extent that it aligns with WedsIn's purpose of allowing people to meet one another. Misuse of other users' information may result in termination of your account.
WedsIn’s Content:
The text, content, graphics, user interfaces, trademarks, logos, sounds, artwork, and other intellectual property on WedsIn are owned, controlled, or licensed by us and are protected by copyright and other intellectual property law rights. All rights to Our Content remain with us at all times.
You may use Our Content for lawful purposes only. You shall not use, sell, or modify Our Content except as permitted by the functionality of the App. You shall not use our name in metatags, keywords, and/or hidden text. You shall not create derivative works from Our Content or commercially exploit it in any way. We reserve all other rights.
App Restrictions
Do's:
● Comply with all applicable laws, including privacy, intellectual property, anti-spam, equal opportunity laws, and regulatory requirements.
● Use your real name on your profile.
Don'ts:
● Act in an unlawful manner, including being dishonest, abusive, or discriminatory.
● Misrepresent your identity, current or previous positions, salary, qualifications, or affiliations with a person or entity.
● Disclose information without consent.
● Create a pyramid scheme, fraud, or other similar practices.
If you encounter any abuse or Member Content that violates our policies, please report it by contacting us or using the "Block & Report" option. We prohibit scraping or replicating any part of the App without our prior consent. Any attempt to do so, by any means (automated or otherwise) aside from our presently offered interfaces, is prohibited.
Privacy
4. Please review our Privacy Policy for important information on how WedsIn collects, uses, and shares your personal data. When you authenticate your phone number, we use it for verification purposes and to contact you in case it is necessary. We will not share your contact number with any other user. By using WedsIn, you agree that we can use your data according to our privacy policy. We may contact you to subscribe to our premium plans or buy value-added services.
Third-Party Stores, Premium Services, and In-App Purchases
5. The App may link to third-party platforms and services (e.g., Apple, Google, Facebook, Twitter) that require you to log in and provide certain credentials and other information to access the App. By using the App, you agree to comply with any applicable terms or conditions of these third-party providers.
We offer Premium Services, which may include one-time purchases or monthly subscriptions for additional account features, such as the ability to extend your matches. If you choose to use Premium Services or make in-app purchases, you agree that additional terms may apply, and you authorize us to charge your chosen
Premium Payment Method. Please note that your payment is non-refundable.
You may purchase Premium Services and in-app products through a Premium Payment Method, such as a Third-Party Store or a credit card, debit card, or PayTm account processed by a third-party processor. If payment is not received, you agree to pay all amounts due promptly upon our demand.
For Premium Services and in-app purchases on a subscription basis, your subscription will automatically renew for the same subscription period as your initial purchase. To avoid additional charges, you must cancel your subscription before the end of the trial or renewal period, according to your Mobile Platform Account's terms and conditions and any applicable Third-Party Store. The pricing may vary due to promotional offers, loyalty bonuses, and other discounts that may apply to your age group.
We are not liable for any payment processing errors, fees, or other service-related problems that may arise from inaccurate account information. Any conflicts between a third-party store's terms and conditions and these Terms will be governed by the third-party store or service supplier's terms and conditions.
Push Notifications and Location-Based Features
We may send you emails, text messages, push notifications, alerts, and other messages related to the WedsIn services, such as enhancements, offers, products, events, and promotions. After downloading the app, you may choose to accept or deny push notifications/alerts. If you deny, you won't receive any push notifications/alerts. If you allow it, push notifications/alerts will be automatically sent to you.
If you no longer want to receive push notifications/alerts, you can opt-out by changing your notification settings on your mobile device. For other types of messaging or communications, such as emails or texts, you can unsubscribe by either following the specific instructions included in such communications or by emailing us at bansi@wedsin.com
The app may provide you access to location-specific content, products, services, and materials based on your location. To do so, the app will determine your location using one or more reference points, such as GPS, Bluetooth, and/or software within your mobile device.
If you disable GPS, Bluetooth, or other location-determining software on your mobile device or don't authorize the app to access your location data, you won't be able to access such location-specific content, products, services, and materials.
By using this website, you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. For additional information regarding the app's use and your data, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
Privacy Policy At WedsIn, we value your privacy above all. We have designed our product with your privacy in mind and have taken steps to ensure transparency, simplicity, and security.
To enable us to accelerate meaningful connections, we require some personal information, such as basic profile details and the types of people you'd like to meet.
By choosing to provide this information, you consent to share the data for our processing purposes.
We take your personal information's security seriously and have dedicated teams that constantly update our security to enhance its safety. We recommend not sharing your contact number or bank account details unless you wish to do so.
To facilitate our services, you choose to give us certain information, such as your login credentials, gender, date of birth, personality, lifestyle, interests, and photos. This information is solely used by us to provide you with improved matches based on your preferences, and we do not share anything on social media on your behalf. You can delete this information anytime by using the "Delete" account option provided as part of your profile settings section.
When you authenticate your phone number, it is used for verification purposes and for our customer success team to contact you if necessary. By choosing to provide this information, you consent to share the data for our processing purposes. You can also choose to delete this information anytime by using the "Delete" account option provided as part of your profile settings section.
When you subscribe to a paid service or make a purchase directly from us, we collect payment information necessary to complete the transaction. This information is stored securely and is only used to complete the transaction.
For more detailed information regarding our data practices, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
); } export default PrivacyPolicy;
